title: CBD as a Medication
itunes:title: CBD as a Medication
description:
Can we use CBD for psychiatric disorders?
This episode discusses the evidence for medical uses of CBD for various disorders, such as childhood epilepsy, schizophrenia, social anxiety disorder, opioid use disorder, and cannabis use disorder.                                              

Faculty: Diana Martinez, M.D.
Hosts: Jessica Diaz, M.D., Flavio Guzman, M.D.

  • Earn 0.75 CMEs: Medicinal Cannabis and the Psychiatric Patient: Clinical Harm vs Novel Treatment
  • Understanding the Evidence for CBD
